TopicTitle: Twitch TV Thursdays: The Couch Stream

Articles.Content:
<p><img alt="image" src="http://media.tumblr.com/e6b9796e0425d604ccf4dd4df2733721/tumblr_inline_mwa40eNxBn1rr2wit.jpg"/></p>

<p>Hang out on the couch and join <strong>Spootyman</strong>, his amazing hair and Yoda for fun times around the galaxy. There’s no telling what adventures he’ll get into on each episode of <strong>The Couch Stream</strong>, airing 5pm to 7pm CST on <a href="http://www.twitch.tv/ksptv/'>http://www.twitch.tv/ksptv/"><em><strong>KSP-TV</strong></em></a>.</p>
